New Records: Virat Kohli scored his 71st century in T20 international cricket
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored 122 runs, KL Rahul scored 62 runs, Bhuvneshwar Kumar took 5 wickets
Pre-Game Insights: India made three changes, Afghanistan played less than 24 hours after the heartbreak against Pakistan
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli acknowledged the support and love of his wife Anushka after scoring the century
Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan dropped three relatively easy catches during the match
Others: India scored 212/2 in their innings, Afghanistan scored 111/8 in their innings, India won the match by 101 runs
